perturbation.original_text: Distributor shall pay Company within thirty (30) days of   Distributor's or,  as  the  case  may  be,  the end-user's receipt of Products.
perturbation.changed_text: Distributor shall pay Company within sixty (60) days of Distributor's or, as the case may be, the end-user's receipt of Products.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction to the original payment terms, which specified 30 days. Now, there is a new section that contradicts the original one.

perturbation.original_text: Distributor shall pay Company within thirty (30) days of   Distributor's or,  as  the  case  may  be,  the end-user's receipt of Products.
perturbation.changed_text: Distributor shall pay Company within fifteen (15) days of Distributor's or, as the case may be, the end-user's receipt of Products, and interest will be charged on late payments after this time.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction to the original payment terms, which specified 30 days. Now, there is a new section that states interest will be charged on payments not made in 15 days.

perturbation.original_text: The term of this  Agreement  shall be ten (10) years (the "Term")  which shall  commence on the date upon which the Company  delivers to  Distributor  the last Sample, as defined  hereinafter.  If Distributor complies with all of the terms of this Agreement, the Agreement  shall be  renewable on an annual basis for one (1) year terms for up to  another  ten (10) years on the same terms and conditions as set forth herein. All renewals of this  Agreement  shall be on the same terms and conditions as are set forth herein.
perturbation.changed_text: The term of this Agreement shall be ten (10) years (the "Term") which shall commence on the date upon which the Company delivers to Distributor the last Sample, as defined hereinafter. This agreement is not subject to renewal.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction regarding the renewal of the agreement. The original clause specifies the agreement is renewable. The modified clause removes this clause.
